feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
